text: The Valet's Wife is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Valet’s Wife; or, The Deceiving UncleThe Valet’s Wife and stars Mack Sennett, Charles Avery, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Mack Sennett as Reggie Van Twiller * Charles Avery as Mr. Tubbs * George Gebhardt as Dinner Guest * Robert Harron as Valet * Guy Hedlund * Arthur V. Johnson as Reverend Haddock * Florence Lawrence as Nurse * Owen Moore * Harry Solter as Postman / Adoption Agent ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Valet's Wife
